title: Grading Queue Message
description: A message describing a grading job to be run.

jobId.description: The unique ID for this job.

image.description: The image that this job will be executed in.

entrypoint.description: The script that will be run to start this job.

s3JobsBucket.description: The AWS S3 bucket to fetch this job from.

s3ResultsBucket.description: The AWS S3 bucket to upload results to.

s3ArchivesBucket.description: The AWS S3 bucket to upload the archives for this job to.

webhookUrl.description: The URL to send results to.

csrfToken.description: The CSRF token to pass when sending results to the webhook.
